name: Lahoma Summers
text: I come here for their wonderful pizza.  It's sooo crunchy and delicious.  Have been coming here for years.  The whole pizza tastes great and most of their specialties are awesome.

name: Nick Name
text: Iâ€™m not sure what has changed, but this Pizza Hut has really stepped UP THEIR GAME! The last few times weâ€™ve ordered from this location have been great! Fast, fresh, hot, and polite. We use to have pretty bad experiences in the past with â€¦More

text: Very good service. Always keeps me satisfied and happy with quality and taste of product.

text: Service was polite and helped quickly.  Pizza wasn't great, but good.  But I ordered what my kid likes, so that's not their fault. ðŸ˜‰

name: Katie Graham
text: This used to be my favorite spot to get pizza but lately they have really been slacking....the last 2 orders I made have all been missing items.  From simply not adding the 'crust flavor' to last night they completely forgot the chicken â€¦More

name: Taisha Mata
text: Lauren the store manager is awesome, she ALWAYS makes sure my pizza are made correctly and she has a wonderful personality. Keep up the good work!!

name: Gregory Hawk
text: One thing I do, is admit when I am wrong. Months ago I wrote a bad review against Pizza Hut, and it was more of a situation where I was having a bad day, and not their fault. I have always received consistent service at this location, and â€¦More

name: David D
text: This Pizza Hut has very poor customer service lately. We tried ordering pizza a couple of days ago and stayed on hold for over 10 minutes and then suddenly the call disconnects. Today (7/29/18) I decided to order online, but accidentally â€¦More

name: Laura Pomeroy
text: I was weary of going here because of all the bad reviews, but I like pizza hut's pizza so I decided to to take a risk. The customer service was great and so was the pizza. No complaints!

name: Kiwi Barone
text: Was ON HOLD to change my order WHILE my order was delivered. On hold 1 hour and 30 minutes (!!!)  Have the IPhone screenshot to prove it. NEVER ORDER FROM PIZZA HUT. all I got was excuses from the call center.

name: Melissa Chick
text: Good food great price

name: Julie A
text: Very cold inside...was warmer outside...in November! Staff was awesome...very polite and helpful

name: neil t
text: Good pizza at a great price. Fast and friendly service.

name: Marcus Cole
text: Asked for extra bbq sauce on my pizza. Got it nice and saucy. Perfectly made!

name: abdi nur
text: They used to do good service but not anymore.              I tried to make order but i didn't get service

name: zeih seven
text: The costumer  service is by far the worst within a 6 mile radius. And the owner, manager and company dont seem to care because this has been happening for at least the last 6 years. A great example of lack of integrity in this costumer (zombies) driven "store".

name: Leigh Tennison
text: I had to work late one night, so I ordered a pizza for my daughter online. They refused to deliver it because she didn't have my card. They further refused to credit my account. So I've paid $22 bucks for a pizza I didn't get. Will never order another Pizza Hut pizza again!

name: Mario Keeney Ditolla
text: Stingy with toppings (I ordered a supreme, which comes with a lot of different toppings and there was far more pizza with just cheese than not), and the girl that helped us initially was pretty rude. Even went on break telling the other employee "and if these guys ever want to order" because we told her we needed a minute.

name: Luke Nemesh
text: "We dont deliver to patients." Its paid for, the food may be left at the front desk with very little additional effort. Begrudgingly accepted the task of delivering to my sick brother. Next time you can keep your hot circle of garbage and stick it you know where! Jerks!

name: Amy Cruz
text: They Never Answer The Phone, No Matter What time you call !?!?

text: If I could give no stars I would every worker is just rude and they never deliver on time and when I ask questions they talk to me like I'm dumb. I will never order here again.
